title: Braum's AI needs to be fixed for his shield
body:
Wardens is already bad enough but for those of us who get offered nothing but wardens can we at least have them work right? 

Braum will put up his shield in the direction nothing is coming from because other melee units are 1v1ing each other on the other side of the field, meanwhile he's got a vayne or ezreal in his face and he still won't shield.

replies.body:
Warden is not that bad, they're easy to build, much more effective when the units hit level 3 and synergies perfectly with mystics, if you get to late game.

I agree with the AI problem, but it's not just Braum. Neeko throws her ability completely randomly and often doesn't hit many champions despite her huge AOE. Yasuo if he has his ability ready and the enemy with most items is reviving with GA, will take a short break, stand still and do literaly nothing to help the team, classic yasuo. Soraka sometimes has odd priorities as well.
Dunno what they changed with last set but they render him totaly useless most of time due to him putting the shield in wrong direction
More often he puts it up facing absolutely nothing at all.
